name: immutadot-lodash
description: immutadot-lodash is an extension to immutadot, adding functions based on lodash.
author: Nicolas Lepage (https://github.com/nlepage)

scripts.pretest: lerna run --scope @immutadot/parser build && lerna run --scope immutadot build
scripts.pretest:coverage: lerna run --scope @immutadot/parser build && lerna run --scope immutadot build
